pageProduct.name: Systane Balance Lubricant Eye Drop 10ml
pageProduct.description:
General Information

Systane Balance Lubricant Eye Drops have restorative formula, clinical strength and intensive therapy for the temporary relief of burning and irritation due to dryness of the eye.

Size: 10mL

Warnings

Ophthalmic use only.
See package insert for complete instructions and important safety information.
It is essential that you follow your eye care professional's directions and all labeling instructions for proper use of the product. If you experience persistent eye discomfort, excessive tearing, vision changes, or redness of the eye, consult your eye care professional as the problem could become more serious.
People allergic to any ingredient in Systane (a trademark of Novartis) Balance Lubricant Eye Drops should not use this product.
Keep out of reach of children.
Do not swallow the solution.
Sterile until opened.
To avoid contamination, never touch the dropper tip to any surface.
Replace cap after use.
Keep container tightly closed when not in use.
Use before expiration date marked on the product.
Discard any remaining product six months after first opening.

IMPORTANT INFORMATION

Tamper Evident. Do not use if tamper evident cap is damaged. Do not use if package has been opened or damaged.

Ingredients

Systane (a trademark of Novartis) Balance Lubricating Eye Drops is a sterile solution containing Polyethylene Glycol, Hydroxypropyl Guar, Mineral oil, Dimyristoyl Phosphatidylglycerol, Polyoxyl 40 Stearate, Sorbitan Tristearate, Boric Acid, Sorbitol, Edetate Disodium, and Polyquad (a trademark of Novartis) (Polyquaternium-1) 0.001% Preservative.

Contains: Propylene Glycol 0.6% w/v, Dimyristoyl Phosphatidylglycerol 0.005%.

Directions

May be used as needed throughout the day. May be used to treat dry eye associated with contact lens usage by instilling drops prior to inserting contact lenses and after the removal of contact lenses. Shake well before using. Tap on base of bottle to instill drops on the eye and blink.

STORAGE INSTRUCTIONS

Store below 30°C.
